overview: Warning! If the sight of young twinks getting their arse-holes stretched by their mates’ clenched fists offends then this movie ain’t for you. On the other hand – excuse the pun! – if you love seeing some of our favourite young fuckers putting their butts to the ultimate test, then you’re in for a treat. Will Sims, Skylar Blu and Matt Johnson are just some of the horny punks who abandon all decency in the search for the ultimate anal thrill. Needless to say, it’s not long before all that hard-fisted action gets its spunky reward!
title: Fisticuffs
